episodes.title: The Doc Analyzes Anything - Episode 2: Cults
episodes.description:
Episode 2 – Cults
On this episode of The Doc Analyzes Anything, Dr. Steven Sparks, Brad Clements, and Kyle Steury take a deep dive into the fascinating and unsettling world of cults. From the psychology of cult leaders to the vulnerability of followers, they explore what drives people to join—and stay—in high-control groups. Along the way, they unpack famous cases, challenge common myths, and even uncover the true story behind the phrase “drink the Kool-Aid.”

This podcast is a project of Sparks Behavioral Services.
For more information, visit sparksbehavioralservices.com
